hero.title: Your logistics partner in Belgium and beyond
hero.subtitle: At Hasev Group, we put our logistics expertise at the service of your ambitions. Based in Belgium, we ensure fast, reliable national and international transport of your goods.
hero.subtitle_2: Our mission is simple: to provide a complete logistics solution tailored to your needs and deadlines. With a modern fleet, an experienced team and optimized transport management, we guarantee accurate tracking and safe delivery across Europe and beyond.
hero.why_us_p1: Responsiveness and flexibility to handle all your urgent needs.
hero.why_us_p2: A reliable and efficient logistics network throughout Europe.
hero.why_us_p3: A constant commitment to quality, safety and customer satisfaction.
hero.why_us_p4: At Hasev Group, every delivery is a kept promise: professional, punctual and transparent service.

about.title: Who are we?
about.p1:
Founded in Brussels, Hasev Group is an import-export company specializing in connecting suppliers, distributors and businesses around the world.
Our mission is to simplify international trade by offering customized, transparent and high-performance solutions.
about.p2: We believe that effective global trade is built on trust, proximity and quality partnerships.
about.p3: To become a key player in responsible international trade, where performance and sustainability go hand in hand.
about.p4: We are committed to promoting greener logistics and supporting fair business relationships.
about.opt3: Rigorous management of logistics and customs flows

services.title: Our services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive import/export and logistics solutions.
services.p1: Complete solutions for import, export, logistics and warehousing tailored to European businesses.

services_list.s1_content: Fast and secure delivery of your goods to any destination.
services_list.s2_content: Planning, flow management, warehousing and distribution customized to your needs.
services_list.s3_content: Embedded technology providing full visibility over your shipments.
